original_text: One basket had very good figs, like those that are ready to eat early in the year. The other basket had very bad figs. They were too bad to eat.
korean_text: 한 광주리에는 처음 익은 듯한 극히 좋은 무화과가 있고 한 광주리에는 나빠서 먹을 수 없는 극히 나쁜 무화과가 있더라

sentences.original_text: One basket had very good figs
sentences.korean_translation: 한 바구니에는 아주 좋은 무화과가 있었고

sentences.original_text: like those that are ready to eat early in the year
sentences.korean_translation: 해가 뜨기 일찍 먹을 수 있도록 익은 것 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: The other basket had very bad figs
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 바구니에는 아무도 못 먹을 정도로 나쁜 무화과가 있었습니다
